roleset.name: to make a photographic reproduction of
roleset.note: PHOTOCOPY-V NOTES: Member of VN Transcribe-25.4 (from photocopy.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: If those words were n't there , the nice people at the Voice would be able [*-1] to send you the information or , at the very least , let you photocopy it .
